sentence.text: In co-culture experiments using positive regulation of protein kinase B signaling-OVA melanoma cells and tumor-specific CD3+ T cells, EGCG reduced PD-L1 mRNA expression about 30% in F10-OVA cells and restored interleukin-2 mRNA expression in tumor-specific CD3+ T cells.

entity.text: positive regulation of protein kinase B signaling

sentence.text: We here report that (-)-epigallocatechin gallate (EGCG) inhibited programmed cell death ligand 1 (PD-L1) expression in non⁻small-cell lung cancer cells, induced by both interferon (blood coagulation)-γ and epidermal growth factor (EGF).
